bibl.seg: MacCoull Leslie S.B., Coptic Documentary Papyri from the Beinecke Library (Yale University). (Publications de la Société d'Archéologie Copte. Textes et Documents. XVII.)

See pp. 1-17: an outline of the main examples of Greek and Coptic documentary papyrus codices, sixth to eighth centuries.
